author.description: Begginer front end developer who writes clean, elegant and efficent code։ Սիրում եմ սովորել, նոր հմտություններ ձեռք բերել և թիմում աշխատել։
author.about: I am Hovhannes Galstyan, 23-year-old begginer front-end developer from Gyumri, Armenia. I like to learn new web programming languages and improve what I already know. I spend my free time doing sports, traveling, listening to music when I'm not writing code. I like coding something from scratch and I love bringing ideas to life in a browser: I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me. I like what I do.
